name: Halong Bay Adventure
summary: Discover the beauty of Halong Bay with a cruise.
description: Embark on a memorable cruise through the limestone karsts and emerald waters of Halong Bay, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

locations.description: Visit Tuan Chau Island for water sports and entertainment.
Explore Titop Island's white sandy beaches and panoramic views.

name: Sapa Trekking Adventure
summary: Trek through the picturesque landscapes of Sapa.
description: Immerse yourself in the culture of ethnic minorities as you trek through terraced rice fields and traditional villages in Sapa.

locations.description: Visit Cat Cat Village to learn about H'mong culture.
Trek to Lao Chai Village and enjoy breathtaking views of the Muong Hoa Valley.

name: Hue Imperial City Tour
summary: Explore the historical wonders of Hue Imperial City.
description: Step back in time as you explore the ancient citadel, imperial tombs, and pagodas of Hue, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

locations.description: Explore the grandeur of the Imperial Citadel.
Visit the ornate tomb of Emperor Tu Duc.

name: Mui Ne Sand Dunes Adventure
summary: Experience the beauty of Mui Ne's sand dunes.
description: Enjoy thrilling activities such as sandboarding and ATV rides amidst the breathtaking landscape of Mui Ne's red and white sand dunes.

locations.description: Experience the stunning sunrise at the Red Sand Dunes.
Enjoy sandboarding and ATV rides at the White Sand Dunes.

name: Hoi An Ancient Town Discovery
summary: Explore the charming streets of Hoi An Ancient Town.
description: Wander through the well-preserved streets of Hoi An Ancient Town, known for its colorful lanterns, tailor shops, and rich cultural heritage.

locations.description: Visit the iconic Japanese Covered Bridge.
Explore the vibrant Hoi An Night Market.

name: Phong Nha-Ke Bang National Park Expedition
summary: Discover the stunning caves of Phong Nha-Ke Bang National Park.
description: Embark on an unforgettable journey to explore the spectacular caves and karst landscapes of Phong Nha-Ke Bang National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

locations.description: Explore the magnificent chambers of Paradise Cave.
Cruise along the Son River to Phong Nha Cave and marvel at its natural beauty.

name: Nha Trang Beach Paradise
summary: Relax and unwind on the pristine beaches of Nha Trang.
description: Indulge in sunbathing, snorkeling, and water sports on the beautiful beaches of Nha Trang, known for its crystal-clear waters and vibrant marine life.

locations.description: Visit Vinpearl Land for amusement park rides and entertainment.
Explore the coral reefs and marine life of Hon Mun Island through snorkeling.

name: Da Nang City Discovery
summary: Explore the vibrant city of Da Nang.
description: Discover the modern skyline, ancient temples, and pristine beaches of Da Nang, one of Vietnam's most dynamic cities.

locations.description: Climb the Marble Mountains for panoramic views of the city and coastline.
Relax on the golden sands of My Khe Beach and enjoy water activities.

name: Mekong Delta Discovery
summary: Explore the vibrant culture of the Mekong Delta.
description: Cruise along the Mekong River and explore bustling markets, traditional villages, and lush green rice paddies in the Mekong Delta region.

locations.description: Experience the vibrant atmosphere of the Cai Be Floating Market.
Explore Vinh Long Province's rural life and fruit orchards.

name: Con Dao Island Escape
summary: Relax and rejuvenate on the pristine beaches of Con Dao Island.
description: Escape to the tranquil paradise of Con Dao Island and unwind on its secluded beaches, snorkel in crystal-clear waters, and explore its rich history.

locations.description: Relax on the pristine sands of Dam Trau Beach.
Learn about Vietnam's history at Con Dao Prison.
